author: steveking
msg: Allow passing NULL for the config dir param in svn_config_walk_auth_data,
which means using the default configuration directory path.
(svn_config_walk_auth_data): Remove check for NULL config dir string.

msg: MAHOUT-1293 Source distribution archives assembly descriptor sets correct bin directory permissions so that its content can be unpacked
